main.name: Kevin Zieber
main.description: I am a full stack software engineer with a passion for learning and building. Let's make something together.
main.bio: I am passionate about the immense democratizing potential of technology and decentralization. Though I'm most experienced with full stack JavaScript, I love learning, and I've only scratched the surface of what's possible.
main.bio2: If you're interested in working together on something, please let me know. I am always looking for new projects to which I can contribute!
main.contactmessage: Send me a message if you'd like to chat. I would love to hear from you!

resume.skillmessage: Below are some technologies with which I'm proficient or familiar mostly in order of my level of experience

education.description: Completed a four-month, intensive full-stack software engineering program focused on the NERDS (Node, Express, React, Databases with SQL) stack.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Journalism, minor in Russian language

work.title: Bar Manager
work.description: Supervised bar team of six. Managed expenses and inventory, responsible for ordering all beer and liquor. Responsible for coming up with new cocktails, pricing, implementation, and staff training..

work.title: Bartender / Server
work.description: Delivered high-end customer service. Enhanced upscale bar standards. Provided top-notch, personalized hospitality in a high-volume setting. Maintained high levels of service in high pressure situations.

projects.title: Topper
projects.category: A Chrome extension and progressive web app that allows direct cryptocurrency payments between social platform users

projects.title: Would You Like This?
projects.category: Fully functioning ecommerce site built in just 10 days for Fullstack Academy
